line_1: Studies to find out latent dues,
line_2: And regulates the state of pews;

line_1: His Talk was now of Tythes and Dues,
line_2: Cou'd smoak his Pipe, and read the News;

line_1: Foremost to give his Lord his dues,
line_2: Foremost to bless the welcome news,

line_1: Ah sparing deal out scanty dues,
line_2: And keep whate'er thou canst refuse!

line_1: Soon the priest shall have his dues.
line_2: If the theme the swain pursues,

line_1: The right to pay no taxes, tithes, or dues;
line_2: The liberty to do whate'er I chuse;
